Verify the 'main-product-image' element has source 'product-xyz-hero.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x450px, natural dimensions 1200x900px, alt text 'High-quality product image', and loads within 500ms

Verify the video player is visible, width 100%, height 56.25% (aspect ratio 16:9), initially muted, and can switch to fullscreen mode

Verify a loading spinner is visible, has width 32px, height 32px, color #007BFF, and animation 'spin' with duration 1s and infinite iteration
